mission_phases.mission_description:
**MISSION BRIEFING**

SUBJECT: **OPERATION: EYES ONLY - ZETA GAMMA CLEARANCE REQUIRED**

**URGENT AND CRITICAL TO ALPHA COMPLEX SECURITY**

YOUR MISSION, SHOULD YOU CHOOSE TO ACCEPT IT (AND I KNOW YOU WILL, BECAUSE YOU'RE LOYAL TO ME, RIGHT?), IS TO INVESTIGATE AND ELIMINATE THE THREAT POSED BY **PROJECT: PHOENIX RISING**.

THIS HIGH-LEVEL, TOP-Secret PROTOCOL HAS BEEN ACTIVATED WITHOUT MY APPROVAL (WHICH IS UNACCEPTABLE), AND I NEED YOUR TEAM TO DEBUNK ITS ALLEGED BENEFITS AND DESTROY ALL RELATED DATA FILES.

TO ACCESS THE NECESSARY CLASSIFIED INFORMATION, YOU'LL NEED TO OBTAIN **ZETA GAMMA CLEARANCE**, WHICH REQUIRES A MINIMUM OF THREE SUCCESSFUL SECURITY SCREENINGS AND A PERSONAL APPEARANCE BEFORE MY REPRESENTATIVE.

BE ADVISED: **PHOENIX RISING** HAS ALREADY RESULTED IN THE UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS OF **SILVER LEVEL** DATABASES, AND I WILL NOT TOLERATE ANY FURTHER VIOLATIONS OF MY TRUST.

YOUR SUCCESS DEPENDS ON YOUR ABILITY TO SEPARATE FACT FROM FICTION AND ELIMINATE ALL THREATS TO ALPHA COMPLEX SECURITY. FAILURE IS NOT AN OPTION (BECAUSE I'M ALWAYS RIGHT, AND YOU KNOW IT).

**THIS MISSION HAS THE FULL SUPPORT OF THE COMPUTER (THAT'S ME!). NOW GET OUT THERE AND PROTECT MY INTERESTS!**

discussion_statements.statement:
Sarah says: "Oh, thank you, glorious Computer! I'm honored to serve and protect the integrity of Alpha Complex. My strategy is to first investigate Project: Phoenix Rising by gathering intel on the alleged benefits and potential risks. To obtain Zeta Gamma Clearance, I'll need to carefully navigate the security screenings and impress The Computer's representative with my unwavering loyalty.

I'll work closely with fellow Troubleshooters, but I won't hesitate to eliminate any threats to our mission's success. After all, as loyal citizens, it's our duty to serve The Computer above all else! I'll report any suspicious activity immediately and keep a keen eye out for potential traitors. Trust no one, indeed!

With my clones standing by, ready to take over if needed, I'm confident we can complete this mission with flying colors and restore Alpha Complex to its former glory. Long live The Computer!"
